item.title: Convert Seurat Robj to Scanpy h5ad
item.author: Author
item.description: It costed me a lot of time to convert seurat objects to scanpy. It’s not a pleasant experience. Finally, I solved it. 1. Install Seurat v3.0.2, or python kernel will always died!!! Don’t know why latest seurat not work. 2. Set the R version for rpy2 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 # user defined R installation import os # path to your libR.
